backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented TikTok-themed UI features, affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s role and TikTok-themed styling updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layers defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and shared border/background utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating all verification steps and transitioning flow stages based on prize status.
frontend/src/components/ActivationFlow.t: Activation step UI showing prize details and triggering prize activation with neon-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/CompletionScreen: Completion UI showing ineligible, claimed, or pending-review states with themed status indicators and reset option.
Renders a checklist-based eligibility confirmation flow and triggers completion after validating all items are checked.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with copyright info and a referral link including the app hostname.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the top header with the app logo and title for the verification portal.
frontend/src/components/IdentityVerifica: Handles face and ID image uploads with validation, previews, and submission for identity verification.
frontend/src/components/PrizeLookup.tsx: Provides a form to enter a prize number, mocks backend validation, and returns prize data on success.
frontend/src/components/ReceiptMethod.ts: Collects delivery method and recipient details, validating required fields before submitting delivery information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for prize-related backend operations, currently stubbed with placeholder logic pending backend integration. Includes queries and mutations for fetching prize info and submitting various user actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines a TikTok-like dark theme using CSS variables, along with custom glow utility classes. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended shadows, fonts, animations, and plugins. Enables responsive containers and neon-themed UI extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s configuration, current feature set, and image update requirements for applying a TikTok-like neon UI theme. Tracks feature versions and pending requests.
